name: Kraal Brands
tag_list: web-design, online-marketing, identity-design, graphic-design, logo-design, seo, adwords, ppc, social-media-marketing, sem, smo, joomla, php, website-design, css, south-africa
overview: Kraal Brands, is a full service digital agency delivering creative web design and online marketing solutions. Our key focus is applying the most creative and innovative technologies towards solidifying your online presence - this though building compelling websites, and engaging an effective online marketing mix. Guided by our philosophy of bridging the gap between technology and humanity, we strive to deliver consumer focused web solutions that are not only user friendly but also lethal weapons on the marketing front.
